_description: The refrain of a dance-song, quoted in a sermon — three lines

OxfMert248.Transcription:
A gurdul of gileIch wolde go a mileTo see þe
                    mordaunt
OxfMert248.Editions:
Bennett,  Jack Arthur Walter,  and  G. V. Smithers, eds.  
             Early Middle English Verse and Prose.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1966: 128.
